description: Create a new cartItem with the provided data

description.example: Welcome email cartItem for new users

summary: Checkout cart items to create an order
description: Convert cart items for an employee into an order with optional installment payment. If items array is provided, only those specific items will be checked out. Otherwise, all cart items will be checked out. Calculates totals, creates order items, generates installments if payment type is INSTALLMENT, and clears only the checked-out items from the cart.

employeeId.description: Employee ID who owns the cart

items.description: Optional array of specific items to checkout. If not provided, all cart items will be checked out.

quantity.description: Quantity to checkout (must not exceed quantity in cart)

installmentMonths.description: Number of months for installment plan (required if paymentType is INSTALLMENT)

installmentSummary.description: Summary of installments (present when paymentType is INSTALLMENT)
